common.disablesUseToSwitchSpace: Switching space from console is not allowed by current role
common.spaceTip: Only required when you need to execute queries in a specified space.
common.name: Name

doc.schemaIntro: You can use the Schema page to operate graph spaces in Nebula Graph
doc.importIntro: You can use the Import page to batch import vertex and edge data into Nebula Graph for graph exploration and data analysis.
doc.consoleIntro: When data is imported, you can use the Console page to query graph data.
doc.useGuideTip: Learn how to use NebulaGraph Studio
doc.ngqlIntroTip: nGQL is a declarative graph query language for Nebula Graph. It allows expressive and efficient graph patterns.

warning.connectError: Connection refused, please configure server again

formRules.nameValidate: The name must start with a letter, and it only supports English letters, numbers and underscores
formRules.replicaLimit: Replica factor must not exceed the number of your current online machines({number})
formRules.ttlRequired: Please select the corresponding property, and the data type of the property must be integer or timestamp

console.exportVertex: Please choose the column representing vertex IDs from the table
console.exportEdge: Please choose the columns representing source vertex ID, destination vertex ID, and rank of an edge

import.enterPassword: Please enter your nebula account password
import.uploadTemplate: Drag & drop the YAML configuration file to this area
import.uploadBoxTip: The YAML configuration file is used to describe information about the files to be imported, the Nebula Graph server, and more.
import.fileUploadRequired: 1. Please make sure all CSV data files are uploaded before import the YAML file. If not, please go to
import.exampleDownload: 2. An example for the configuration file:
import.uploadTemplateTip: 3. Configure the Yaml file: please keep only the file name (retain the file extension) for all file paths (path, failDataPath, logPath) in the template, e.g. logPath: config.csv
import.templateMatchError: The {type} in the configuration does not match the current login account/host

schema.useSpaceErrTip: Space not found. Trying to use a newly created graph space may fail because the creation is implemented asynchronously. To make sure the follow-up operations work as expected, Wait for two heartbeat cycles, i.e., 20 seconds.
schema.cancelOperation: Do you want to close this panel
schema.cancelPropmt: If you close the panel, the configuration will be deleted automatically. Are you sure that you want to close the panel?
schema.fieldDisabled: A TTL configuration is set for this property, so it cannot be edited. If you want to edit this property, delete the TTL configuration.
schema.indexExist: An index exists, so TTL configuration is not permitted. A tag or edge type cannot have both an index and TTL configuration.
schema.indexedLengthDescription: Set the indexed string length. If you are indexing fixed strings, you must not set this option.
schema.indexedLengthRequired: Indexed length must be a positive integer
schema.timestampFormat:
Supported data inserting methods:
1. call function now()
2. call function timestamp(), for example: timestamp('2021-07-05T06:18:43.984000')
3. Input the timestamp directly, namely the number of seconds from 1970-01-01 00:00:00
schema.dateFormat:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function date(), for example: date('2021-03-17')
schema.timeFormat:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function time(), for example: time('17:53:59')
schema.datetimeFormat:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function datetime(), for example: datetime('2021-03-17T17:53:59')
schema.geographyFormat:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function ST_GeogFromText(), for example:ST_GeogFromText('POINT(6 10)')
schema.geography(point)Format:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function ST_GeogFromText('POINT()'), for example:ST_GeogFromText('POINT(6 10)')
schema.geography(linestring)Format:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function ST_GeogFromText('LINESTRING()'), for example:ST_GeogFromText('LINESTRING(3 4,10 50,20 25)')
schema.geography(polygon)Format:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function ST_GeogFromText('POLYGON()'), for example:ST_GeogFromText('POLYGON((1 1,5 1,5 5,1 5,1 1),(2 2,2 3,3 3,3 2,2 2))')
schema.durationFormat:
Supported data inserting methods:
Call function duration(), for example:duration({years: 1, seconds: 0})
schema.statTip: The statistics execution time is affected by the amount of data.

empty.statsTip: Click the button to start statistics
empty.tagTip: Click the button to create tag
empty.edgeTip: Click the button to create edge
empty.indexTip: Click the button to create index
